page.title: 06Mortimer Children's Jokes
page.content: We collected jokes from the children, in connection with a Fun Day at School. Jokes are drawn from tele- vision, joke books, comics, friends, lolly sticks, cereal packets, Christ- mas crackers etc., falling mainly into these categories:-{Doctor, doctor {jokes:-}Doctor, doctor, I feel like a pack of cards. I'll deal with you later.{Knock,knock jokes:-}Knock,knock Who's there? Dish-washer. Dish-washer who? Dish-washn't de way I shpoke before I had falsh teeth.{Logical {jokes:-}How many jelly babies can you fit into an empty jar? None, or it wouldn't be empty, would it? {Play on {words:-}How do you start a flea race? One, two, flea, go. How does the Kangaroo cross the channel? By hoppacraft.{Attribute jokes:-}(often original) What's yellow and is good at sums? A banana with a calculator.
